<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    
<style>
body {
  background-image: url('https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/137487.jpg');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: cover;
  background-size: 100% 100%;
  background-color:white;
}
h1 {text-align: center;}
*.temp {font-size: 20px !important;}

</style>
<style>
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    text-align: center;
}
</style>

<iframe  id="myFrame" style="text-align:center;"  width="300" height="120" frameborder="0" src = "">Weather</iframe>

<script>
(function(scope) {
    // watch msg object from Node-RED
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        // new message received
        var x = document.getElementById('myFrame');
        x.setAttribute('src', msg.payload); 
        });
})(scope);
</script>
